General.Name: Speciality Restaurants Limited
General.Description: Speciality Restaurants Limited owns and operates restaurant outlets and sweet shops in India. The company operates its restaurants under the Mainland China, Oh! Calcutta, Asia Kitchen by Mainland China, Sigree, Sigree Global Grill, Spicery by Sigree, Jungle Safari, Urban Deccan Pub, Hoppipola, Hay, Episode One, Gong Modern Asian, Sweet Bengal, Café Mezzuna, Flame & Grill, Haka, POH, Machaan, and Zoodles brand names; and confectionaries and cafes under the Sweet Bengal and Dariole brands, as well as bars under the Hay and Episode One brands. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Mumbai, India.
